title: FBA customer returns
description: FBA customer returns report Data Reports

return-date.description: The date and time when the return was initiated

order-id.description: The unique identifier of the order associated with the return

sku.description: Stock Keeping Unit of the product

asin.description: The Amazon Standard Identification Number of the product

fnsku.description: Fulfillment Network Stock Keeping Unit of the product

product-name.description: The name of the product returned by the customer

quantity.description: The quantity of the item returned

fulfillment-center-id.description: Identification of the fulfillment center where the return was processed

detailed-disposition.description: Detailed description of the disposition of the returned item

reason.description: The reason provided for the return by the customer

status.description: The status of the return process

license-plate-number.description: The unique identifier of the license plate associated with the return

customer-comments.description: Comments provided by the customer regarding the return

dataEndTime.description: The end date and time of the data record
